issue.title: [Python] pyarrow._exec_plan.execplan doesn't wait for plan to finish
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16419](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16419). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It calls StopProducing but doesn't actually wait for finished(). This tends to cause "Plan was destroyed before finishing" to get printed.
